::KitKat::

She was hit in the hip and once in the side.  She stood her ground 
and kept firing Airbomber and Rizopas. "I am not scared of you, your 
nothing but slag on two legs." as she fired 3 rounds at Rizopas.

She looked at Drillbit.  She whispered to him,"I love you."

She turned her head back and shot her rifle again.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "THECODE" <thecode@p...> wrote:
> Doom Ice turned a cartwheel and avoided the shots. Artist stanbds 
up in time
> to get blasted down again. Rizopas gasps and gets plowed down.
> 
> "I never met someone as scared of me as you!" Rizopas yelled to 
KitKat.
> Airbomber was surpried that his shots never even made it to KitKat, 
so he
> fired 4 more times...
